post.body: Jay. from Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back? I'd f*ck him senseless. (weird crush, i kno)
(picking up stompies here) daisies aren't gay enough. you need lillies. or crysanthemums.
go Connor! you must be relieved?
cool. i'm as pale as...well....a snowman.
lol. my complex has them all - white, chinese, indian, portugese, german, dutchman, black. alles.
i think the current is pretty cool. clean, edgy, classic.
haha. it's all good. i'm of the belief that one day there will be no white/black/indian - only coloured. a race of goldenskin ppl.
well my mother, my sister and i are the only whiteys on that side of the family. we always get laughed at.
lol - my mother married a coloured man three years ago.
yahoot chat?
i have white, coloured and indian family. i don't even know all their surnames.
shuddup man. it gives us a second to compose ourselves, before having to deal with it.
he's fine. it was a small bump to the lip from one of his toys.
both. without hesitation.
sure, okay. well then remember i have to deal with shitty nappies. your situation sounding better, yet?
hotness. am melting.
i just gave The Kid a frog carved out of jade, and he said 'pwetty, pwetty'.
The Kid is bleeding from the mouth. bawling his face off. bumped his head. going to give him an ice lolly.
